STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local total = 0 local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() total = filter:CountStopAt( 3 ) if total > 2 then local characteristics = Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_FLYING, 1 ) end
